rs in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How c=

ed inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, b=
ut it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and =

                          =

                                "What are we going=

I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and =

ome we can't all get along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. S=

orner.

w, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our i=

                                "Yeah, and nobod=
y is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

od up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to=
 look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water=
 in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbombe=

             "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing t=
o do, and--"

ato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing c=
ards.

other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a f=
ield...
